_meanings:
{@--4@} Union, conjunction,
combination, mixture, miscellaneous
collection; {#DUmajyotiHsalilamarutAM#} 
{#saMnipAtaH kva meGaH#} <ls>Me. 5.</ls>

{@--7@} A
combined derangement of the three
humours of the body causing fever
which is of a dangerous kind.

{@--8@}
A kind of musical time or measure.

fever arising from
a vitiated state of the three 
humours of the body.
